comments.body: and why is the generator not adding `license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +49,53 @@    cell count matrix and fill in missing transcripts. Read more: van Dijk et al. (2018)
    <DOI:10.1016/j.cell.2018.05.061>.'
